description: Our place is good for couples and families (with kids). It is close to Choice Market(a nice bakery with an assortment of food , pastries and coffee) and Speedy Romeo(the best pizza around).
name: Cozy 2 Bedroom Apartment (Clinton Hill, Brooklyn)
review: Although we never had gotten to meet Bubby, he was a great host with clear direction and good communication. The place was very spacious and clean and around the corner from public transit. Bubby made us feel very welcomed in his home!
